data.name: XEventAttacher
desc: makes it possible to attach script events given by a sequence of ScriptEventDescriptor structures to a given interface.

methods.name: attachListener
desc: registers the given \"AllListener\" object as a listener at the given interface by creating a suitable listener adapter and calling the \"addListener\" method corresponding to the \"ListenerType\".

methods.name: attachSingleEventListener
desc: registers an object as a listener at the given interface by creating a suitable listener adapter and calling the method which corresponds to the listener type.
Only the event corresponding to the given event method will be delegated to xAllListener.

methods.name: removeListener
desc: removes a listener object as a listener from the given interface.
This method can and should be used as a contrary method to the two attach methods.
